replies.body: I find it hard to read 3 lines here without finding something that is either extremely aggravating, extremely condescending or extremely annoying and thus deserving a punishment.
And the first post you make is already a punishable offense either, jeez...yeah, I am not going to dignify you with further attention...

It looks like you were already at the last tier of the [Instant Feedback System's](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) ladder, so any negative experience caused at that point would have resulted in a permanent suspension.  You were provided with two match logs in this case, but looking at this you are constantly telling players that you're going to afk from the game, spamming, berating others because of their placement, and constantly throwing report threats.  

I'm not part of the PB team, but these are just my thoughts on the matter.  You're welcome to reach out to our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more context.
